subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Juan Martín del Potro saved three match points to get past Marcos Baghdatis, 4-6, 6-4, 7-6 (4), and reach the second round of the Dubai Championships.
snippet: Juan Martín del Potro saved three match points to get past Marcos Baghdatis, 4-6, 6-4, 7-6 (4), and reach the second round of the Dubai Championships.
